analogous to the absence of food as essential for nourishment and growth.', 'Comparable to a car running on an almost-empty tank - just as fuel is needed to keep a vehicle moving, food is necessary for human sustenance.', 'Similar to a clock with hands frozen at noon - illustrating the point in time when hunger would be most acute if not addressed.', 'Like a play without actors - symbolizing how vital food is as an actor that brings life and energy to our bodies.', 'Resembling a garden overtaken by weeds - parallels the way neglect can cause a system (or person) to devolve from its intended, nourishing state.', 'Like a boat without sail in the middle of the ocean - showing how lacking food is like being adrift without direction or purpose.', "Akin to an empty bird's nest after hatchlings have left -
